casebody.data:
JACOB CASPER, Plaintiff and Respondent, v. JAMES O’BRIEN, Defendant and Appellant.

Before Barbour, Ch. J., Monell, and Freedman, JJ.

Decided November 29, 1873. A. Oakey Hall, for appellant. R. S. Newcombe, for respondent.

Opinion by Freedman, J. Barbour, Ch. J., and. Monell, J., concurred.

Action to recover the value of property taken and. converted, etc.

Appeal from judgment in favor of plaintiff.

Judgment affirmed.
